laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial urinary PBG levels were 221 /H9262mol/d (Patient 1), 172 /H9262mol/d (Patient 2), 75 /H9262mol/d (Patient 3), and 115 /H9262mol/d (Patient 4). Subsequent levels after treatment were: Patient 1: 13 /H9262mol/d; Patient 2: 23 /H9262mol/d; Patient 3: Not specified; Patient 4: Not specified. Follow-up levels for Patients 1 and 4 were 75–137 /H9262mol/d and 13–27 /H9262mol/d respectively.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient 1: minor fluctuations from 75 to 137 /H9262mol/d over 4 years; Patient 2: PBG level decreased to 9 /H9262mol/d after 1 year; Patient 3: Not specified; Patient 4: ranged from 13 to 27 /H9262mol/d over 3 years.
